title: CCG lf Plat+ Jungler
body:
Hi everyone, Crowd Control Gaming is looking for a jungler to fill our roster. We are a serious team looking to go forwards and climb the ranks, enter tournaments, etc. Must have good availability of a night time.
Add me in game: CCG Eggzille

replies.body:
Plat + Jungler, wanted to join as jungle is my most pref role but i play bot lane with a friend so i can support him and so i asked you but you denied and said that I'm not a jungler main I'm a bot lane. :( feelsbadman.
PS. should put Jungler Main but either way please don't judge by someones match history
Too bad in a team gg
No one cares if u are in a team... dat just...
